name: jamescraker
text: I love fat Philippe.

name: lizjones
text: Fat Philippe is so much sassier than regular Philippe.

name: killerlimpet
text: He's feeling fat, and sassy!

name: songbirdspectre
text: And also lives in a giant bucket...I wish.

name: confusion
text: Now if only he were the queen of France.

name: leftsaidtim
text: yaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaay!

name: deimosrising
text: The alt text here kills

name: heatbag
text: I was just laughing at how great that alt text is.

name: tomsonlocal
text:
I once snorted vicodin then fell asleep in complete bliss on a small sofa with two people who had done the same thing laying on top of me. I've never had a threesome but if the alt text is anything to go by I had a vicodin style threesome.

Better than nothing I guess.

name: laserblade
text: It's like on Chappelle's Show: technically a three-way

name: werthog42
text:
Goddammit you did it here too!!!

(I hope you read the other one first)

name: deimosrising
text: I knew alt text was being implemented eventually so now I don't have a bunch of posts rendered into spam by the inexorable advance of the ages.

name: blarghamagarky
text: I feel like you do it Vicodin Style a lot when you're married

name: tekende
text: I hope this is not true, but it probably is after the first couple years.

name: nabeel84
text:
The only problem with Acheworld is inability to see the alt-text. So here it is:
Have you heard of doing it Vicodin Style. The man is in the other room smiling and the lady is asleep.

name: saint
text: all phillipe wants is nachos, but todd saw an opportunity and is seizing the moment. all hail todd.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Todd, stop trying to use minors to get prescription drugs! Jeez!

name: huber
text:
Todd is a king

We need a Todd T-shirt... don't we people

name: rolotonybrowntown
text: i would like to see more anecdotes from philipe's tree house

name: rotating-dog
text: But Philippe, with Vicodin you can buy many nachos!

name: hearshot
text: Explain how.

name: deusoma
text: Vicodin can be exchanged for goods and services.

name: rotating-dog
text: Woo-hoo!

name: _cheesekayke
text: Whenever I see Vicodin these days, I always think of House. A chubby for you!

name: radchillies
text: chubbied for the simpsons reference

name: fmercury
text: This is a great avatar/post combo.

name: songbirdspectre
text: Philippe is such a fat bitch lately.

name: miaou
text: He's a big hot tranny mess.

name: apocowarg
text: I had a LOT of Vicodin Style sex when I had my first spinal surgery. I highly recommend it.

name: relaxing
text: According to my research, Toby Keith did the Ford Trucks song at this time.

name: rowboat
text: And he's back doing them again. Though Mellencamp has really upped the ante over at Chevy. He upped the ante on hellishness.

name: hypoluxa
text:
Was he on Vicodin????


p.s.
Fat Phillipe is the best.

name: artifakt
text: In the end...aren't nachos all anyone

name: boredom_man
text: No, I'm pretty sure I want Vicodin.

name: drskradley
text: Todd better not put him on the Fuck Plan.  He is five.

name: history
text: Because of strips like this one, when I read other comics online, I am physically saddened when I mouse over them and there is no alt text.

name: heccibiggs
text:
FUCKING, ME TOO.

I thought I was the only one. Every single comic I read now, it's " *mouseover* ... oh, wait..."

I feel like I have found a kindred spirit.

name: charchar
text:
www.xkcd.com
www.qwantz.com
www.asofterworld.com

Three brilliant webcomics, all with alt.text for days.

name: foetus_punch
text: Also, Dr. McNinja. I'm afraid I don't have it's fancy URL, because I'm lazy.

name: tekende
text: "For days"?

name: charchar
text: yep.

name: tekende
text: Well that explains it.

name: howwedo
text:
Penny Arcade is THE WORST because you'll hover your mouse and it'll show an alt text box...but then all there is is the title.

Being used to alt text is an adventure in heartache

name: drago25
text:
I didn't get Vicodin when I had my wisdoms out :(
PS: nachos sprinkled with Vicodin? eh, eh? I'm gonna try it.

name: mikeronomicon
text: Pissed off fat Philipe may be the best thing ever invented.

name: tripleg
text: now he just needs to start telling swears

name: miaou
text: Teodor's definitely leaning on panel 5 !
